movies.title: The Heart Machine
movies.plot: A man begins to suspect that his long-distance girlfriend whom he met on the Internet has been living in the same city as him, and he sets out looking for her.
movies.simplePlot: A man begins to suspect that his long-distance girlfriend whom he met on the Internet has been living in the same city as him, and he sets out looking for her.

biography.bio: John Gallagher Jr. has appeared in several television programs, including The West Wing (1999), Law & Order: Special Victims Unit (1999), NYPD Blue (1993), Ed (2000), Love Monkey (2006), and Hallmark Hall of Fame's film The Flamingo Rising (2001). He played Jim Harper in Aaron Sorkin's The Newsroom (2012) which aired on HBO[16]. He also appeared in HBO's mini-series Olive Kitteridge (2014), based on the Pulitzer-winning novel of the same name, in the role of Christopher Kitteridge. Film credits include Pieces of April (2003), Woody Allen's Whatever Works (2009), Jonah Hex (2010), The Heart Machine (2014), _Kenneth Lonergan's Margaret (2005)_, and a lead role in Short Term 12 (2013) opposite Brie Larson. In 2016, he starred in the thriller film 10 Cloverfield Lane (2016) and the horror thriller film Hush (2005).
biography.name: John Gallagher Jr.

biography.bio: Kate Lyn Sheil is an actress and writer, known for Equals (2015), You're Next (2011) and Green (2011).
biography.name: Kate Lyn Sheil

biography.bio: Louisa Krause was born on May 20, 1986 in Falls Church, Virginia, USA. She is known for her work on Martha Marcy May Marlene (2011), Young Adult (2011) and Ava's Possessions (2015).
biography.name: Louisa Krause

biography.bio: David Call is an actor and producer, known for Tiny Furniture (2010), James White (2015) and Gabriel (2014).
biography.name: David Call

biography.bio: Halley Gross received her undergraduate degree from The Gallatin School at New York University, with a concentration in comedy writing. Soon after, she received a master's degree in dramatic writing from The Tisch School of the Arts, also at New York University, concentrating in writing for television. She lives in Los Angeles.
biography.name: Halley Wegryn Gross

biography.bio: Libby Woodbridge is known for her work on House of Cards (2013), King Kelly (2012) and Girls (2012).
biography.name: Libby Woodbridge

biography.bio: Before his career in movies RJ was a regular on the NASA web show Kids Science News Network. His rise to fame included discussing the inner workings of servers, and how wind tunnels work. His superb explanations enlightened the youth of the 1990s and onward.
biography.name: RJ Brown

biography.bio: Katie Paxton is an actress, known for Billy & Billie (2015), The Heart Machine (2014) and How He Fell in Love (2015).
biography.name: Katie Paxton

biography.bio: Karen Goeller is a member of NY Women in Film & TV. She has had a variety of scripted and improv roles on film, tv, commercials, and industrials. Karen is most often cast as a wife, lawyer, detective, FBI Agent, college professor/teacher, doctor, or reporter. She would like to continue with appropriate roles in film, TV, commercials, and industrials. She will also gladly do voice-over and commercial print work. You can also cast Karen Goeller according to any of her special abilities. Her "Special Abilities" include Precision Driver, Ballroom Dancer (waltz, foxtrot, tango, quickstep, viennese waltz, cha-cha, hustle), Gymnastics Coach, NSCA-CSCS-Strength/Sports Coach (qualified to train pro athletes of any sport.), Fitness Trainer, Physical Therapy, former NYPD, former EMT. Karen Goeller is very well-spoken and college educated. She spent a long time reducing her Brooklyn accent. Karen has a BA Degree and a year of law school. As a business owner for many years, she has hosted and directed countless events. Karen has given presentations to professional groups including the NSCA, USA Gymnastics, and the Chamber of Commerce. As an author, business owner, and actor Karen Goeller is has been interviewed on TV and radio countless times. She is always interested in hearing about suitable roles that she can bring to life.
biography.name: Karen Goeller

biography.bio: Sam Quartin is an actress, known for Let Me Make You a Martyr (2016), By the Rivers of Babylon (2017) and Judas' Chariot (2014).
biography.name: Sam Quartin

biography.bio: Roderick Hill is an actor and producer, known for Run All Night (2015), Kinsey (2004) and King Kelly (2012).
biography.name: Roderick Hill

biography.bio: Evan Louison is an actor, writer, producer, & composer, known for Redlegs (2012), Joy de V (2013), & The Heart Machine (2014). Originally a musician, his transition into acting began after years spent working both backstage and behind the camera. His performances have since received praise from The Hollywood Reporter, Variety, Filmmaker Magazine, & the New York Times.
biography.name: Evan Louison

biography.bio: Peter Albrink is an actor and producer, known for To Be Determined (2010), The Heart Machine (2014) and Game Lands (2014).
biography.name: Peter Albrink

biography.bio: Cherri Reams is an actress, known for Sad:( (2014), The Heart Machine (2014) and Dissensions (2012).
biography.name: Cherri Reams

biography.bio: Rich Petrillo is an actor, known for Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) (2014), The Amazing Spider-Man 2 (2014) and Creed (2015).
biography.name: Rich Petrillo
